name: Areapal
tag_list: areapal, siddharth-jeevagan, kaviraj-k, prithviraj, srikanth-rajan, shalini-gowrisankar, sankeerth-reddy, neighbour-hood-networking, meet-up, friends, social-networking, india, start-up-in-india, start-up-from-india, young-entrepreneurs
description: Discover happenings near and around you
overview:
What is areapal ?

areapal.com is a platform to discover interesting things happening near and around you !

Why did this happen ?

The idea was simply triggered by a couple of friends thinking - how would it be if we came to know about interesting things happening around us right now?

It may range from anything like :

  • Breaking news of the movie released recently .
  • The bad experience you had in the hotel nearby
  • The rumor going on in the college nearby
  • Film shooting going on in the next street .

Why areas ?

Why areas ?  well did have a lot of options like Pin code,IP ,GPS etc.  but talking to a few hundred people we came to know that these options are either boring or people were uncomfortable pin pointing their exact location constantly . But the concept of area seemed to bring fun , as well as served the purpose . So we stuck on to areas :)

Who takes care of all this ?

Done by a wide pool of energetic students/youngsters , areapal is a community driven project . The entire philosophy is user driven
